value.title: Protect your identities with Azure AD Identity Protection
value.excerpt: Use the advanced detection and remediation of identity-based threats to protect your Azure Active Directory identities and applications from compromise.

value.title: Azure AD Managed Service Identity | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Arturo Lucatero joins Donovan Brown to discuss Azure AD Managed Service Identity, which can be used to authenticate to any service that supports Azure AD authentication. For more information, see: What is Managed Service Identity (MSI) for Azure resources? (docs): https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/managed-service-identity/overview

value.title: How to secure a Blazor application with Azure Active Directory | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to secure a Blazor WebAssembly application with Azure Active Directory.   For more tips and tricks, visit: https://aka.ms/azuretipsandtricks   Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today with Microsoft

value.title: Enable secure access to apps for external users with Azure AD B2C
value.excerpt: Use Azure AD B2C as the full-featured identity system for your application, and ensure that users are required to sign in securely by using multi-factor authentication.

value.title: Enable secure external collaboration for your applications with Azure AD B2B
value.excerpt: Azure AD B2B collaboration lets you securely share your company's applications and services with guest users from any other organization, while maintaining control over your own corporate data.

value.excerpt: Learn how to secure Cognitive Services to prevent data loss and privacy violations for user data that may be a part of the solution.

value.title: How can I deploy a resource with a managed identity? | One Dev Question: Arturo Lucatero
value.excerpt: In the One Dev Question series, Arturo Lucatero, a Senior Program Manager working on managed identities for Azure resources, explains how to deploy a resource that contains a managed identity.    For more information, visit: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/managed-identities-azure-resources/overview
